articles.title: Asia-Pacific countries sound the alarm and commit to tackling antimicrobial resistance - World Health Organization (WHO)
articles.description: Health leaders from countries and areas of the World Health Organization (WHO) South-East Asia and Western Pacific Regions today sounded the alarm and committed to work together to more effectively tackle antimicrobial resistance (AMR). They endorsed a joi…
